snippet: New polls in South Carolina give Mitt Romney a comfortable lead, with Rick Santorum and Newt Gingrich in a battle for second.
abstract: New polls in South Carolina give Mitt Romney a comfortable lead, with Rick Santorum and Newt Gingrich in a battle for second.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- The first South Carolina polls in more than two weeks are out, and they show a lead for Mitt Romney but with Rick Santorum and Newt Gingrich in a competitive position.
